channel.title: Game Facilitator Camp: Pursuivant
channel.description:
Thursday evenings in November at 7pm (GMT). RSVP to this one and you commit to the other 3 sessions in Nov on the same day each week at the same time.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIABgYofvNePY3InkgJ

item.title: Game Facilitator Camp: Pursuivant
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

We’re trying to cover the timezones: Gauntlet Facilitator Camp Capybara, November 2020

They’ll be another one targeting Australasia, too.

I will be recording my opening session and encouraging campers to record their one-shots for reference.
Whether any are posted will be for them to decide.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Facilitator Camp: Pursuivant
item.dc:creator: @RDUNeil
item.description:
@RDUNeil wrote:

Are these going to be recorded and posted, as I simply can’t do 2:00 in the afternoon my time. I’m at work.

Read full topic
